Edited June 1, 2021 by Baltor
Are you relying on the autosave? What happens if you manually save with F5?

Is Windows giving any error messages about security?

 Friend of mine has a similar problem in another game using Windows Home.

23 hours ago, Baltor said:

The games is not saving my games, it only save the first seconds of the begining of the game so i have to start everyday from scratch

I had a similar problem a long time ago and the problem was an Option called Windows Controlled Folder access.

I turned that off and i could save again, or it might be related to Steam cloud saving but i doubt it.
